description: When Mason Wyler discovers Brent Biscayne reading up on some really boring shit, he tries to distract him by turning up the sexiness. The truth is, Brent was in a hurry and didn't have time to beat off before leaving the house earlier, and now he is definitely in the mood to pound some ass.Mason starts things off with some hot cock sucking.  Brent reciprocates and soon the guys are 69ing like wild men.  At 6'9' Brent is a tall dude, and he's got a shlong to match.  But Mason is no stranger to well endowed, robust young gentlemen.  He handles Brent's meat pole like a champ.  Enjoy!
title: Mason Wyler & Brent Biscayne
